alert.note: Alert for Mobile (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 8:00PM CDT until May 15 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Mobile County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 759 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mobile Regional Airport, or 7 miles west of Midtown Mobile, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Semmes, Tanner Williams and Mobile Regional Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
